                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <div class="sc-gLEhor knanVO">Well, major thanks to the curing process, they typically last anywhere from 12 days to 3 weeks.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         <div class="sc-gLEhor knanVO">However, there are few things to keep in mind before applying. Make sure the nail bed is dry enough (not brittle). There absolutely must be no presence of lotion or any sort of oil that could make it harder for gel nail polish from latching on.</div>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <div class="sc-gLEhor knanVO">On the contrary, if you love getting your nails done by UV lamps then just apply sunscreen before the process – just to be safe and secure.</div>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <div class="sc-gLEhor knanVO">One thing that’s pretty common among gel fanatic is that the picking process. When the color begins to lift, you will be tempted to get rid of it, almost such as you would a scab. Once the peeling phase starts, it’s hard to not pick at your polish. If you take it off, you are most likely taking some layer of your nail polish off with it. This sort of injury can take over six months to repair.</div>

It is not clear exactly which component caused the thinning, but one or more points within the gel process are responsible.</div>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <div class="sc-gLEhor knanVO">Suggestion would be to let your natural nails breathe in between gel manicures. One way or another you nails do get damaged whenever you get gel manicures . It is not just the gel manicures that do the damage, nevertheless, even simple manicures could weaken and harm the nails.</div>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <div class="sc-bdvvtL gleLhz" data-testid="text-style--normal" data-text="" data-ui="Text">
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <div class="sc-gLEhor knanVO">However, if the gel nails are applied and taken off correctly and considerably, then it is totally safe to wear it frequently. If it is peeled and buffed more often than usual then the gel can certainly weaken the natural nails. It is suggested to be more careful when you have applied the nails and especially if your wear them on an ongoing basis.</div>
